Package clientGUIControllers

Class ManageMyOrderController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.ManageMyOrderController
public class ManageMyOrderController extends Object
Manage my order controller for see details about all user's orders history and confirmation receipt of shipments. This class created to allow each user to see his order history, all the details on each of these orders, the order status (if he received it or not). In addition, on this screen, in cases of orders made by deliveries, the user will be able to indicate that he received the shipment.

  • Constructor Details

    • ManageMyOrderController

      public ManageMyOrderController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      The initialize method is used to set visibility of the buttons ,text fields, combo box, images and labels. In addition, this method gets all of the user's orders and insert their order numbers to the combo box.

    • selectOrder

      void selectOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - An order is selected from the orders combo box. According to the selected order, the method will show the user all the details about it and the content of the order, and only if it is a delivery type order that has been approved by the operations employee and has not yet reached the customer, the customer will be able to confirm its receipt.

    • helpPressed

      void helpPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - Help button pressed the method will show the help label and set the help button to disable.

    • updatePressed

      void updatePressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - Update button pressed, When the customer clicks on the update button, the method will update the status of the order and the date of receipt of the order, In addition, a small screen will pop up that informs that the delivery process has been completed successfully.

    • selectStatus

      void selectStatus(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - An status is selected from the status combo box. This method will cause the update button to disable according to the selected status just when the customer will choose "Received" status he can click on update.

    • xPressed

      void xPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - X button pressed. close the program and log out the user.

    • backPressed

      void backPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - Back button pressed. This method will take us to the appropriate screen according to the type of customer.

    • logOutPressed

      void logOutPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - log Out Button Pressed log out the user.

    • initTableView

      private void initTableView()
      method to set the wanted order's details into the table.

    • findOrder

      private Order findOrder(Integer orderNum)
      Finds an Order object based on the order number.
      Parameters:
      orderNum - The order number to search for.
      Returns:
      An Order object that matches the given order number, or null if no match is found.

    • setLabels

      private void setLabels()
      This method set labels for the initialize screen.

    • localDateToDate

      private Date localDateToDate(LocalDateTime date)
      Converts a LocalDateTime object to a Date object.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDateTime object to convert.
      Returns:
      A Date object that represents the same date and time as the input LocalDateTime object.

    • updateEstimateDate

      private void updateEstimateDate(Date estimateDeliveryDate)
      Parameters:
      estimateDeliveryDate - from type Date and go to the DB to update the delivery date.
